Class GenePool

java.lang.Object
  GenePool

public class GenePool
extends Object

This class resembels a database file for all possible organisms in the game. In the future, it may have a user input constructor to allow user defined animals or plants.

Version:
2014.03.13
Author:
GD

Constructor Detail

GenePool

public GenePool()
Constructor for objects of class GenePool

Method Detail

deer

public GenePool deer()
Deer code for Organism objects.

Returns:
The GenePool instance for deers, requierd by objects of class Organism.

generateID

public void generateID()
Generate a unique ID for the organism using it's unchanging fields: maxHealthPoints + ":" + breedingCycle + two first letters of name + hitByFire. And set it as its ID

getAllAvilableOrganisms

public GenePool[] getAllAvilableOrganisms()
Returns a List collection of keys for the geneCollection avilable in this gene pool object.

Returns:
a List collection of all the uniqe ids of the organisms that are avilable in this gene pool object.

getBreedingCycle

public int getBreedingCycle()
Get the breeding cycle. Or, how often does the organism reproduce.

Returns:
An int number holding the number of cycles requierd to pass before an organism can reproduce.

getCanEat

public ArrayList<String> getCanEat()
Get the collection containing the food the organism can consume.

Returns:
An ArrayList containing id Strings of the organisms this organism can consume.

getChanceHitByFire

public double getChanceHitByFire()
Get the organism's chance of getting hit by fire.

Returns:
A double containing the organism's chance to get hit by fire (decimal point percentage).

getCurrentHealth

public int getCurrentHealth()
get the current health points of the organism.

Returns:
An int holding the current health points of the organism.

getID

public String getID()
Get the unique Id that was generated for the organism.

getLifeStatus

public boolean getLifeStatus()
Return the organism's isAlive boolean identifier.

Returns:
True if the organism is a living Animal. False if it's dead or a plant.

getMaxHp

public int getMaxHp()
Get the max health points of the desired organism.

Returns:
An int holding the max health points of the organism.

getMaxPopPerPoint

public int getMaxPopPerPoint()
Get the maximum number of the same organism allowed per point on the map/grid.

getName

public String getName()
Get the name of the organism, e.g. deer, grass, tree, etc.

Returns:
The name of the organism as String.

getRandomCode

public GenePool getRandomCode()
Generate a random organism code and return it.

Returns:
A new random GenePool object for random organism reation.

grass

public GenePool grass()
Grass code for Organism objects.

Returns:
The GenePool instance for grass, requierd by objects of class Organism.

setBreedingCycle

public void setBreedingCycle(int cycles)
Set the breeding cycle. Or, how often does the organism reproduce.

Parameters:
cycles - The amount of cycles before the organism can reproduce.

setChanceHitByFire

public void setChanceHitByFire(double chance)
Set the organism's chance of getting hit by fire.

Parameters:
chance - The chance to get hit by fire in percentage.

setCurrentHealth

public void setCurrentHealth()
Set the current health point to equal the max health point, since all new organisms begins with full health.

setLifeStatus

public void setLifeStatus(boolean isAlive)
Set the organism's isAlive boolean identifier.

Parameters:
isAlive - Whether or not the organism is living. True if it is a living animal, False if it's a dead or a plant.

setMaxHp

public void setMaxHp(int hp)
Set the max health points of the desired organism.

Parameters:
hp - The max health points of the organism.

setMaxPopPerPoint

public void setMaxPopPerPoint(int maxPerPoint)
Define the maximum number of the same organism allowed per point on the map/grid.

Parameters:
maxPerPoint - The cap allowed per point on the map/grid.

setName

public void setName(String name)
Set the name of the organism, e.g. deer, grass, tree, etc.

Parameters:
name - The name of the organism.

tree

public GenePool tree()
Tree code for Organism objects.

Returns:
The GenePool instance for trees, requierd by objects of class Organism.
